description: Sample pre-plan / pre-incident plan records for EmergencyResponseCoordination

records.seo_fdcLocation: East side of building, near loading dock
records.seo_tacticalNotes: Large open floor plan with multiple anchor stores. Interior access via main corridors. Roof access ladder on northwest corner. Command post staging in north parking lot.
records.seo_accessNotes: Main entrances on north and south sides. Fire department access lane on east side to loading dock. Knox box at main security office, north entrance.

records.seo_knownHazards: Chemical storage in Building C. Confined spaces in tank farm.
records.seo_tacticalNotes: Offensive attack limited to Building A. Defensive only for Building C chemical storage. Master stream from west side.
records.seo_accessNotes: Knox box on main gate. Secondary access via Industrial Park Road.

records.seo_knownHazards: Oxygen concentrators in multiple resident rooms. Medical gas storage in ground-floor utility room.
records.seo_tacticalNotes: Non-ambulatory residents on all floors. Prioritize elevator-assisted evacuation. Interior standpipe on each floor.
records.seo_accessNotes: Front desk staffed 24/7. Knox box at main entrance.

records.seo_knownHazards: High-rack storage throughout. Forklift propane tanks stored near west dock.
records.seo_tacticalNotes: Large undivided space with high-rack storage. Collapse hazard from loaded racks if exposed to fire. Defensive operations recommended if significant fire load involvement.
records.seo_accessNotes: Main truck entrance on south side. Pedestrian entrance on east. Knox box at pedestrian door.
